info.brief_description: One day you shrink, (for no reason). Live everyday like your last, Right?
info.description:
**Dear everyone, I decided to put my story back on the market. Feel free to read and/or add. Email me If there are any complaints. Enjoy**


This is a story about a kid shrinking to about 3/4 of an inch, and having some fun while your that size. The characters are



Jason: (You) an average Caucasian teenage boy (15 to be exact). your hormones are kicking in, and makes you have your moments and urges. You might as well blame your hormones for your death... if that happens.


Hannah: (Mom) about 5'11" and bodacious. Just cause she's your mom, doesn't mean you can't enjoy that. she is 34 and still lookin' fine. No husband.

Veronica: (Sister) about 5'9" and HOT!! 17, and single... but, ew, she is your sister
http://i636.photobucket.com/albums/uu90/NicoletteVincelli/Me/Me-MiniSkirt.jpg

Carry: (Girlfriend) about 6'0" (as tall as you were). you love each other for who you guys are, no matter how small... hopefully
http://i690.photobucket.com/albums/vv267/MoreTasteFul/Girls/hot-emo-girl3.jpg

RULES:
1. i dont care if you die... but dont just say "then the foot came down, and he was gone", i like discription.

2. im okay with sex, cussin', vagina's, shit, anuses, boobs, whatever, but i dont want boobs in every sentence for no reasons.

3. i want to make this feel like your in the story, so if your adding on, make others feel like there in it.

4. 2nd person only. words like "you". i'd also like it if the main character stay unaware for the most part.

5. No gay stuff please, am not a fan of dicks and penises... but i dont mean to offend anyone when saying that.

6. i have no idea what toilet stuff is, so i'm just going to say no going down drains, or flushed down toilets, how do you continue from that? "he then lived his life in the sewers?" it ain't workin' for me

7. i also like to be able to read what im reading, lets make that possible

8. editing? maybe. Deleting? never.

9. last rule: i know your shrunk, but having a normal C-cup bra is just fine, there is a thing called too big. i like normal people with normal breasts, not DD-cups, but if your referring to it looking like that, its fine.

Please add and have fun... i really like this stuff, and you should enjoy it too
